Counter-Strik:Sours (CSS) - это многопользовательская игра, шутер от первого лица. В этой игре основной задачей является: обезвреживание бомбы, спасение заложников и убийство команды противника. CSS может похвастаться: бесчисленным количеством разнообразных карт, обширным арсеналом оружия и множеством режимов.
В этой игре можно попробовать следующие режимы: Classic, deathrun, deathmatch, bhop, zombi survivel, minigame.
Что касается игроков, могу сказать что с людьми в этой игре, можно не только весело провести время за игрой в CSS, но и приятно пообщаться.
Провел в ней больше чем в ГО!
Esta chido, sobre todo como para jugar los mapas de surf y bhop

Since go is dead after the whole F2P update I moved to this game. I am quite impressed and after a couple hours I don't understand why this isn't the game played at the top level. Everything is just so much smoother! Much better than that shitty console port of a game csgo!
still worth buying in 2019 hours of fun

But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounter consequences that are extremely painful. Nor again is there anyone who loves or pursues or desires to obtain pain of itself, because it is pain, but because occasionally circumstances occur in which toil and pain can procure him some great pleasure. To take a trivial example, which of us ever undertakes laborious physical exercise, except to obtain some advantage from it? But who has any right to find fault with a man who chooses to enjoy a pleasure that has no annoying consequences, or one who avoids a pain that produces no resultant pleasure?

Nostalgic game that I always like to come back to every now and then. Whether it being because I want to practice my aim on a few players in a Dust 2 deathmatch, or if I want to be a rebelling prisoner. Hell, even if I feel like being a bunny and hopping around on a few blocks I come back to this game. 

It deserves its reviews and deserves your play. 
10/10
